title: Drawing, "Fantasy Landscape", ca. 1742–43
medium:
Pen and brown ink, brown wash, ruled borders in pen and brown
Support: white laid paper laid down on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink, lower right on sheet and mount: Piranesi; on verso in pen and brown ink: B.P.L. No. 138
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Fantasy Landscape", ca. 1742–43.
ca. 1742–43. Pen and brown ink, brown wash, ruled borders in pen and brown
Support: white laid paper laid down on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7695.
